T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    e = input().split(' ')
    N = int(e[0])
    X = int(e[1])
    N_space = input().split(' ')
    number = 0
    for i in range(int(N)):
        if int(N_space[i]) < X:
            number = 1 + i
    print(number)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (N, X) = map(int, input().split())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = 0
    attack_house = 0
    while i < N:
        if A[i] < X:
            attack_house = i + 1
        i = i + 1
    print(attack_house)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = n - 1
    k = -1
    while i in range(n - 1, -1, -1) and k == -1:
        if x > a[i]:
            k = i
        i -= 1
    print(k + 1)
    t -= 1

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, x) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().rstrip().split()))
    arr.reverse()
    s = 0
    y = len(arr)
    for j in arr:
        if j < x:
            s = s + 1
            y = arr.index(j)
            break
    print(len(arr) - y)
